description: This Python source file defines API endpoints for managing ride operations in a bike-taxi booking system using FastAPI. It includes functions for booking, accepting, starting, completing, canceling, and retrieving rides, along with fare estimation logic.

classes.name: Ride
classes.description: Model representing a ride, including details like rider and driver info, status, and fares.

methods.name: float _estimate_fare(pickup_lat: float, pickup_lng: float, dropoff_lat: float, dropoff_lng: float)
methods.description: Calculates a simple estimated fare based on pickup and dropoff coordinates.

methods.name: book_ride(body: RideRequest, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Creates a new ride request in the system.

methods.name: accept_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.DRIVER)))
methods.description: Allows a driver to accept a requested ride.

methods.name: start_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.DRIVER)))
methods.description: Marks the ride as in progress.

methods.name: complete_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.DRIVER)))
methods.description: Completes the ride and finalizes the fare.

methods.name: cancel_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Allows a passenger to cancel a ride if it hasn't started.

methods.name: list_my_rides(user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Retrieves a list of rides associated with the passenger.

methods.name: get_ride(ride_id: str, user=Depends(require_role(Role.PASSENGER)))
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific ride by ID.

ctags.name: _estimate_fare
ctags.pattern: /^def _estimate_fare(pickup_lat: float, pickup_lng: float, dropoff_lat: float, dropoff_lng: float)/
ctags.signature: (pickup_lat: float, pickup_lng: float, dropoff_lat: float, dropoff_lng: float)
